questions.question: Q1. Do you want to test the water quality at this household? (taking consent)

options.name: Yes, water source is located on the premises
Yes, but water source is located elsewhere

questions.question: Q2. We would like to test quality, is that ok?

options: Yes, water source is located on the premises
Yes, but water source is located elsewhere

Q6. If yes, can we conduct the test on Bacteria?

No not in the rainy season

I didnt think it is very important to get water tested

questions.question: S1a. Do you use latrine/toilet for defecation?

Toilet that flush/pour to septic tank

Toilet that flush/pour to pit latrine

questions.question: H15a. If other, please specify

[introduction] I would like to ask you about investments in your WASH facilities. First I am asking about costs for operation and maintenance. Then I would like to talk about investments for new construction. Is that distinction clear?
O1. During the last year, have your spent money on hygiene products (e.g. soap/pads/cleaning products)?
O1a. If Yes, how much? (in Taka)
O2. During the last year, have you spent money on the use of water and sanitation facilities and/or services?
O2a. If Yes, how much? (in Taka)
[questions about maintenance] O3. During the last year, have you spent money on the operation and maintenance of WASH facilities and services? SH facilities and services?
O3a. If Yes, how much? (in Taka)
O4. How would you rate the availability of spare parts and other materials needed for maintaining WASH facilities and services?
O5. And what do you think of the costs for this?

O6a. If yes, how much have you invested (in Taka)?
O7. How do you perceive the amount you have invested to construct the latrine?
O8. What was your main source of funding?

options.name: Loan from community savings groups/credit groups

All the adults ( above 18 years old) in the household
